name: Not the Job Description
description:
Welcome to the Hell Dimension, a land with a large feline population and an array of supernatural creatures. Being the only human in town, you're yet to make any new friends.

Ever since you were young, you dreamed of starting your own cafe! You can't run one on your own, however, so you decide that finding some job applicants shouldn't be too hard... right?

What starts out as a morning shift ends up a lackluster expedition that's definitely NOT in your job description. Who knows? Maybe you'll find the meaning of self-worth along the way.
